channel.title: ggpubr on Javier Tamayo-Leiva
channel.description: Recent content in ggpubr on Javier Tamayo-Leiva

item.title: Descriptive statistics and visualization in R
item.description: Table of Content Introduction Loading your data in R How to load the data from RStudio? Descriptive statistics with {stat} in R Central tendency measures Dispersion measures Distribution measures Variance analysis Plot your data with {ggplot2} Basic plot Components of a plot in {ggplot2} Choosing Colors Choose the graphic with the geom objects Complete your analysis with {ggpubr} {ggpubr} functions Final plot Introduction Many times I have seen that people are interested in learning R because of the visualizations that can be generated with packages like {ggplot2}.
